RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 4000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPER BLACK DUCK inside, kicked clear. CHICKS CORONA JMG mild rail rally. ALEKAT ROMANCE pace dispute, faded. ANZIO three path, no late gain. JIORGINO trailed. PER RULING #25252 DATED 3/2/23 RECEIVED FROM THE LOUISIANA RACING COMMISSION, CHICKS CORONA JMG WAS DISQUALIFIED DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 4000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET LONDON ROSE denied all rivals. MINT COOKIE CUTTER tough duel, edged. ABOVE THE FIRE bold bid, outdueled. JW EXPLODING CORONA broke outward. SURVIVING THE STORM no closing kick.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 220 Y Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 4500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMERICAS SOLDIER fired, held. BUDS DUCKS just missed. CHLOES WILDONDAMONEY denied in duel. WATTLE in mix, outfinished. JM VALENTINA finished under restraint. TTT JESS IVAN bid, weakened.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 300 Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 8200. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUX BUX BUX long duel, best. KOOLN INSEPRABLE dueled every step. ROGUE FROM THE SOUTH floated out midway. KS GRAND KISS unable to match stride. TMF ROGUE CARTEL obliterated start. POPS ZOOMIN TOOLE SM broke in sharply. MCV AMERICAN GIRL bid, faded. NIPSEY lost footing at break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRESJETDASH exploded first step. DYNASTY BLOOD bumped, rallied. WORKING FOR A LIVIN best of rest. BAD AS U CAN BE finished full of run. REGAL WAGON STREAK too little too late. JB TOO SEXY urged, empty. LITTLE DOC GDP second flight duel. FIRST IVORY ROSE chased speedster.

ENTRY.NAME: Regal Wagon Streak
ENTRY.OWNER: Garcia Victor A and Galicia Juan

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MP FLY HIGH just held. BT MAGIC GAME dueled, missed. JRS TONYAS MAJESTIC broke inward. BLUE BUENO danced in gate. MJ FAST DASH late to level. HEZ PRETTY FAST bumped, no rally. ZEE RUNAWAY TRAIN hugged rail. FIVE BAR PANTHER early bump. JJJ VALENTINO altered lanes. JESS A WILD CANDY missed break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 400 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASH TRAIN B left them in dust. EN TREPEIN winner too tough. HONKYTONK TRUTH clean, chased runaway. PRSBLAIRPITTSPROJECT urged, needed more. JESS A STORMY DEAL steadily faded. JRS MAJESTIC PRINCE never fully fired. JESS A SOLDIER slow into stride. RIDIN HIGH broke out sharply.
